name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in full-stack development, showcasing proficiency in **Java**, **Spring**, **JPA**, **JDBC**, and **Spring Data**. Demonstrated expertise in **TypeScript** and **Angular**, alongside a solid understanding of **CI/CD** practices. Adept at working with databases like **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, and proficient in messaging systems such as **Kafka**, **JMS**, and **RabbitMQ**.
Skilled in containerization with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, and experienced in utilizing **Maven** and **Yarn** for automation. Strong capabilities in testing frameworks, specifically with **Cypress** and **Jest**.
Additionally, I possess extensive experience in delivering high-performance applications within the healthcare and financial sectors. I have hands-on expertise in **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, utilizing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, while implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines. Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
